member.name: T:Diamond.Core.Workflow.State.IStateDictionary
member.summary: Defines a dictionary that can be used to manage state in work flows or other patterns.

member.name: M:Diamond.Core.Workflow.State.IStateDictionary.ConvertParameter(System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Retrieves and converts a dictionary item to the specified type.
member.param: The unique key of the item to retrieve.
member.returns: The value of the dictionary item in the specified type or an error if the item could not be converted.

member.name: M:Diamond.Core.Workflow.State.IStateDictionary.ConvertParameter``1(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves and converts a dictionary item to the specified type.
member.param: The unique key of the item to retrieve.
member.returns: The value of the dictionary item in the specified type or an error if the item could not be converted.

member.name: M:Diamond.Core.Workflow.State.IStateDictionary.Get``1(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a dictionary item and casts it to the specified type. No conversion is performed. An exception is thrown if the key is invalid.
member.param: The unique key of the item to retrieve.
member.returns: returns the item as the given type.

member.name: M:Diamond.Core.Workflow.State.IStateDictionary.Get``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Retrieves a dictionary item and casts it to the specified type. No conversion is performed. The default value is returned if the key is invalid.
member.param: The unique key of the item to retrieve.
The default value to return if the item does not exist.
member.returns: returns the item (or the default value) as the given type.

member.name: M:Diamond.Core.Workflow.State.IStateDictionary.TryGet``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Attempts to retrieve an item from the dictionary by the specified key. If the item does not exist it will be created and initialized with initializeValue.
member.param: The unique key of the item to retrieve.
The value to initialize the item to if it does not exist.
member.returns: Returns the existing item or the initialized item.

member.name: M:Diamond.Core.Workflow.State.IStateDictionary.Set``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Sets a value in the dictionary. I the item does not exist, it is created. If the item already exists, it is updated. Attempting to change the item type could have unexpected side affects and is not recommended.
member.param: The unique key of the item to retrieve.
The value used to set the item.

member.name: T:Diamond.Core.Workflow.State.IStateTypeConverter
member.summary: Defines a state converter that can convert a state dictionary time from one type to another.

member.name: P:Diamond.Core.Workflow.State.IStateTypeConverter.TargetType
member.summary: Get the target type of the converter.

member.name: M:Diamond.Core.Workflow.State.IStateTypeConverter.ConvertSource(System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Converts the item from the source to the target.
member.param: The target type of the conversion.
member.returns: Returns the converted item or an error.
